headline: Atmos Energy (ATO): Examining Valuation After Recent Policy Changes and Share Price Gains
summary: Atmos Energy (ATO) stock has delivered steady gains over the past month, rising just over 7% in the past 3 months and nearly 28% year-to-date. Investors watching the utility space may be curious about what is driving this performance. See our latest analysis for Atmos Energy. Momentum has clearly been building for Atmos Energy, with its share price rising throughout the year and recent news helping to sustain growing investor optimism.
